paragraphs.p1: Hello! I'm Jeferson Fernandes, a full stack developer passionate about technology. My journey began a few years ago with curiosity about programming, and since then I have been evolving to build modern and functional web applications.
paragraphs.p2: I am currently in the 5th semester of Systems Analysis and Development and have worked on projects using technologies such as React, Next.js, TypeScript, .NET, Entity Framework, and relational databases.
paragraphs.p3: My focus is to combine performance, usability, and development best practices to deliver solutions that truly make a difference for companies and users.
paragraphs.p4: Outside the coding world, I enjoy learning new things, sharing knowledge, and participating in initiatives that strengthen the tech community.
